name: rorschach (itch)
description:
=== rorschach ===

=====

a blank world is before you.

distribute your ink across the map to reveal platforms.

=====

=====

use your ink wisely, as you only have a little.

created in 48 hours for djam3.

=====


=====

made in gamemaker studio 2.

art in aseprite.

music in bosca ceoil.

sound effects in bfxr.

font m3x6 by managore.

=====
